parameters.name: DestColumns
parameters.description: Target data table mapping field list.

parameters.name: ErrorLimitCount
parameters.description: When the data in Kafka does not match the ADBPG target table, it will cause a write failure. This value is the number of error rows allowed; exceeding this will cause the task to fail.

parameters.name: FallbackOffset
parameters.description:
The fallback offset for data consumption.

*   This parameter specifies the starting offset from which data consumption resumes when a consumer does not request a consumption offset or requests a consumption offset that is beyond the range of the offset information recorded in the current Kafka cluster. You can choose to start data consumption from the earliest or latest offset.

Valid values:
*   EARLIEST
*   LATEST

parameters.name: JobConfig
parameters.description: Job configuration file, required for professional mode.

parameters.name: MatchColumns
parameters.description: Match columns, usually all primary key columns of the target table. If all column values in this configuration are the same, the two rows of data are considered duplicates.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
Region ID.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) API to view available region IDs.

parameters.name: TryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to test the real-time job. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: UpdateColumns
parameters.description: Update columns, usually all non-primary key columns of the target table. When data duplication is determined through MatchColumns, updating the UpdateColumns column values will result in new data overwriting old data.

parameters.name: WriteMode
parameters.description:
The write mode.

Valid values:

*   MERGE
*   INSERT
*   UPDATE
